name: Konohagakure
startIntroPart1: Hashirama Senju, First Hokage of the Hidden Leaf, you founded a village that strives for peace and unity amidst a world torn by war.
startIntroPart2: Will the Will of Fire guide your people to unity and prosperity?
declaringWar: Regret this betrayal, for the Leaf never forgets.
attacked: You leave us no choice but to defend our own.
defeated: Even a forest must fall... but the seeds will sprout again.
denounced: You have turned from the path of peace.
introduction: Welcome to Konohagakure, stronghold of the Will of Fire.
neutralHello: Peace is the dream we pursue.
tradeRequest: Let’s forge a better future together.
uniques: Units heal fully when stationed in Forest

name: Sunagakure
startIntroPart1: Gaara of the Sand, protector of the desert and beacon of reformation. Your leadership transformed Sunagakure into a respected shinobi power.
startIntroPart2: Will you lead your people from the sands into the heart of the world stage?
declaringWar: You’ve tested the patience of the desert!
defeated: I have no regrets… I gave everything to my people.
denounced: You’ve become a threat to the shinobi world.
introduction: I am Gaara, Fifth Kazekage. Let’s walk the path of peace — if possible.
tradeRequest: A mutually beneficial trade, I hope.
uniques: [Units] trained in Desert gain +10% combat strength

name: Kirigakure
startIntroPart1: Mei Terumī, Lady Mizukage of the Hidden Mist, you guide your people out of a bloody past toward a brighter future.
startIntroPart2: Can you cleanse the mist of its bloody history and forge a new future through strength and diplomacy?
declaringWar: The mist shows no mercy.
defeated: Even in defeat, the Mist endures.
introduction: I am Mei, Mizukage of the Mist. We prefer clarity, but do not mistake kindness for weakness.
neutralHello: Let us see through the mist.
tradeRequest: A fair trade, as clear as water.
uniques: Enemy units have reduced visibility near your territory

name: Kumogakure
startIntroPart1: Raikage A of the Cloud, you rule a proud and powerful mountain nation with strength and thunder.
startIntroPart2: Will you use your power to lead the shinobi world or conquer it?
declaringWar: The lightning falls!
attacked: So be it! We fight with thunder!
denounced: You are not worthy of trust.
introduction: I am A, Fourth Raikage. You better mean business.
hateHello: You have one chance to walk away.
tradeRequest: Don’t insult us with a weak deal.

name: Iwagakure
startIntroPart1: Ōnoki of Both Scales, leader of the Hidden Stone, your wisdom and willpower are as unyielding as your mountains.
startIntroPart2: Will your legacy build a future of strength and science?
declaringWar: The rock crushes all!
defeated: So... this is how the stone falls...
introduction: I am Ōnoki, the Rock that never crumbles.
tradeRequest: Make it worth my while.

name: Amegakure
startIntroPart1: Pain, God of Amegakure, your ideals seek to bring peace through overwhelming force.
startIntroPart2: Will your vision of pain reshape the world or destroy it?
declaringWar: This world shall know pain!
defeated: Perhaps... peace lies through another path...
introduction: I am Pain. I bring justice to a broken world.
hateHello: You are unworthy of my time.
tradeRequest: A means to peace, perhaps.
uniques: Enemy units take -10% combat strength in your borders

name: Otogakure
startIntroPart1: Orochimaru of the Sound, you seek knowledge through forbidden science and immortal ambition.
startIntroPart2: Will you remake the world in your own image?
declaringWar: You’ll be a fine test subject.
defeated: No matter… I’ll simply come back.
introduction: I am Orochimaru. Let’s skip pleasantries, yes?
tradeRequest: How interesting… I accept.
uniques: Can steal techs twice as fast

name: Takigakure
startIntroPart1: Shibuki of the Hidden Waterfall, your small but proud village has long guarded the Hero’s Water and remained neutral in war.
startIntroPart2: Can you lead your people to prosperity through diplomacy and subtle influence?
declaringWar: We have no choice but to fight back!
attacked: The waterfall shall roar in response.
introduction: I am Shibuki, leader of the Hidden Waterfall.
tradeRequest: A small stream can still carve stone.
uniques: +10% unit strength for 5 turns after city capture

name: Uzushiogakure
startIntroPart1: Ashina of Uzushiogakure, your clan’s mastery of sealing techniques has stood the test of time and war.
startIntroPart2: Will your legacy ripple through history like the eternal whirlpools?
declaringWar: You’ve chosen the path of no return!
attacked: We will not fade into the sea!
defeated: Even in ruin... our seals hold strong...
introduction: Ashina Uzumaki of the Hidden Eddy welcomes you.
neutralHello: May peace flow like the tide.
tradeRequest: Let us seal a pact.

name: Kusagakure
startIntroPart1: Zōsui of Kusagakure, hidden among dense forests, your shinobi are known for stealth and survival.
startIntroPart2: Will you bloom quietly into power or be trampled underfoot?
declaringWar: You’ve stepped on sacred ground!
denounced: This is a toxic path you walk.
introduction: Zōsui of the Hidden Grass extends cautious greetings.
tradeRequest: A mutual harvest awaits.

name: Yugakure
startIntroPart1: Gen'yūmaru of Yugakure, your peaceful traditions center on balance and healing waters.
startIntroPart2: Will you inspire the world through serenity and strength?
declaringWar: This was not our path... but you forced our hand.
introduction: Gen'yūmaru greets you with calm resolve.
tradeRequest: Let’s find equilibrium.
uniques: Units heal +5 HP per turn in friendly territory

name: Tsukigakure
startIntroPart1: Moon Daimyō of Tsukigakure, your people thrive under mystery and the moonlight’s wisdom.
startIntroPart2: Will your influence spread like moonlight across the world?
declaringWar: You’ll be eclipsed.
denounced: We watched you fall... now we act.
introduction: Tsukigakure watches in silence... and smiles.
tradeRequest: Let our paths align under the stars.

name: Mount Myōboku
startIntroPart1: Fukasaku of Mount Myōboku, sage of the toads, your domain whispers with ancient knowledge.
startIntroPart2: Will your wisdom guide nations or fade into legend?
declaringWar: You chose to fight wisdom with arrogance.
attacked: Even sages know how to bite.
introduction: Fukasaku of the Toad Sages welcomes you to Mount Myōboku.
neutralHello: May the sage arts protect your path.
hateHello: The toads frown upon your misdeeds.
tradeRequest: Let us balance chakra and commerce.
uniques: Units recover +1 HP each turn in enemy territory

name: Ryūchi Cave
startIntroPart1: White Snake Sage of Ryūchi Cave, your power lies in secrecy and serpent-based mastery.
startIntroPart2: Will the world submit to your venomous charm?
declaringWar: Shed your fear... like old skin.
attacked: Striking from the shadows is our way.
introduction: The White Snake Sage hisses with interest.
neutralHello: Do not mistake silence for mercy.
hateHello: You slither where you don't belong.
tradeRequest: Barter, like molting... is natural.

name: Shikkotsu Forest
startIntroPart1: Slug Sage of Shikkotsu Forest, guardian of life and regeneration.
startIntroPart2: Will your healing arts mend the world’s wounds or only your own?
declaringWar: If you seek pain, we shall respond.
attacked: We do not break... we mend and endure.
introduction: The Slug Sage of Shikkotsu greets you in harmony.
tradeRequest: Healing herbs... and peace offerings.

name: Takumi Village
startIntroPart1: Seimei of Takumi Village, your craftsmanship challenges even chakra.
startIntroPart2: Will tools alone shape your place in history?
declaringWar: Prepare to be dismantled.
attacked: Even steel bends under our tools.
introduction: Seimei of Takumi greets you with a smith's bow.
tradeRequest: Let’s hammer out a deal.

name: Hoshigakure
startIntroPart1: Akahoshi of Hoshigakure, where cosmic power shapes ambition.
startIntroPart2: Will your star shine or burn out?
declaringWar: We blaze in stellar fury!
introduction: Akahoshi of the Hidden Star greets you under a radiant sky.
tradeRequest: Shall we share the starlight?

name: Jōmae Village
startIntroPart1: Gennō of Jōmae, the trapper’s legacy lives through you.
startIntroPart2: Will you trick the world into obedience?
declaringWar: Caught you.
defeated: Too clever... for our own good...
introduction: Jōmae welcomes those wary of traps.
tradeRequest: Let’s not trap each other in bad deals.
uniques: Enemy units take damage entering your borders

name: Nadeshiko Village
startIntroPart1: Shizuka of Nadeshiko, warrior of beauty and strength.
startIntroPart2: Will your ideals shape the world's view of peace?
declaringWar: We do not yield our customs.
introduction: Shizuka of Nadeshiko honors your presence.
tradeRequest: Our culture is open, but sacred.

name: Ishigakure
startIntroPart1: Daichi of Ishigakure, mountain-born and iron-willed.
startIntroPart2: Will your stone resolve build or crush?
declaringWar: Like boulders, we fall heavy.
introduction: Daichi of the Stone Outpost stands firm.
tradeRequest: Our quarries offer rare stone and wisdom.
